mapper.sql: ID, BE_LATE, EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYEE_NO, JOBS_NAME, LEAVE_EARLY, ORGANIZATION_NAME, PUNCH, SIGN_IN_TIME, SIGN_OUT_TIME, STATUS_NAME, ORGANIZATION_ID, ATTENDANCE_DATE,IS_LEAVE,VERIFICATION
mapper.insert: insert into ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS (ID, BE_LATE, EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYEE_NO, JOBS_NAME, LEAVE_EARLY, ORGANIZATION_NAME, PUNCH, SIGN_IN_TIME, SIGN_OUT_TIME, STATUS_NAME, ORGANIZATION_ID, ATTENDANCE_DATE,IS_LEAVE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beLate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaveEarly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{punch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{punchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attendanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isLeave,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS
ID,
BE_LATE,
EMPLOYEE_ID,
EMPLOYEE_NAME,
EMPLOYEE_NO,

ORGANIZATION_NAME,
PUNCH,

ORGANIZATION_ID,

IS_LEAVE,

mapper.update:
update ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS
BE_LATE = #{beLate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPLOYEE_NAME = #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOBS_NAME = #{jobsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAVE_EARLY = #{leaveEarly,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUNCH = #{punch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_IN_TIME = #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIGN_OUT_TIME = #{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS_NAME = #{statusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTENDANCE_DATE = #{attendanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_LEAVE = #{isLeave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS set BE_LATE = #{beLate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMPLOYEE_NAME = #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOBS_NAME = #{jobsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAVE_EARLY = #{leaveEarly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUNCH = #{punch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_IN_TIME = #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SIGN_OUT_TIME = #{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_NAME = #{statusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_LEAVE = #{isLeave,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTENDANCE_DATE = #{attendanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(1) FROM ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS WHERE BE_LATE = '是' and TO_DATE(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') < ATTENDANCE_DATE and TO_DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') > ATTENDANCE_DATE
ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NO like '%'||#{no}||'%'and

SELECT SUM(1) FROM ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS WHERE LEAVE_EARLY = '是' and TO_DATE(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') < ATTENDANCE_DATE and TO_DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') > ATTENDANCE_DATE
ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NO like '%'||#{no}||'%'and

SELECT SUM(1) FROM ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS WHERE PUNCH = '否' and TO_DATE(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') < ATTENDANCE_DATE and TO_DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') > ATTENDANCE_DATE
ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NO like '%'||#{no}||'%'and

SELECT SUM(ABSENCE_HOURS) FROM ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS WHERE IS_LEAVE = '是' and TO_DATE(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') < ATTENDANCE_DATE and TO_DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') > ATTENDANCE_DATE
ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.EMPLOYEE_NO like '%'||#{no}||'%'and

select ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS.* from ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS where EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
to_char(ATTENDANCE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{date} and to_char(ATTENDANCE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=#{startTime} and to_char(ATTENDANCE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<#{endTime} and

select
from ATTENDANCE_STATISTICS a where 1=1
and TO_DATE(#{begin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= a.ATTENDANCE_DATE and TO_DATE(#{end,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= a.ATTENDANCE_DATE
and a.EMPLOYEE_NO=#{employeeNo}
AND a.BE_LATE = '是'
AND a.LEAVE_EARLY = '是'
AND a.PUNCH = '是'
ORDER by a.ATTENDANCE_DATE
